Just a comment-the video was resized to 1040P and the size of the torrent requires recoding to be placed on disc.

Perhaps you can look into 2 pass encodings with MeGui with a target size of 7.95 gigs. The dimensions need to remain 1920 x 1080 to be burned to AVCHD.
